name: Uliana's Spirit
flavorText: “Uliana was the first to venture out amongst the laymen while retaining her status-for in those days, monks were forbidden to leave the monasteries, with their forms being used solely to commune with the gods.” -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani
flavorTextHtml: “Uliana was the first to venture out amongst the laymen while retaining her status-for in those days, monks were forbidden to leave the monasteries, with their forms being used solely to commune with the gods.” -Poldamyr's Histories of the Veradani
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Every third hit of your Spirit Generators applies Exploding Palm.(4) Set:     
 Your Seven-Sided Strike deals 777% its total damage with each hit. All damage taken is reduced by 77% for 7 seconds after applying Exploding Palm to an enemy.(6) Set:     
 Increase the damage of your Exploding Palm by 9000% and your Seven-Sided Strike detonates your Exploding Palm.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Every third hit of your Spirit Generators applies Exploding Palm.
(4) Set:
Your Seven-Sided Strike deals 777% its total damage with each hit. All damage taken is reduced by 77% for 7 seconds after applying Exploding Palm to an enemy.
(6) Set:
Increase the damage of your Exploding Palm by 9000% and your Seven-Sided Strike detonates your Exploding Palm.
